description: This file defines the main application component for a LightningJS-based quiz application, setting up routing between Intro, Quiz, and Results pages, and rendering the main layout with a debug overlay.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application component that sets up routing and layout.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Defines the reactive state, including background color and greeting message.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns the component hierarchy, including the router with route configurations.
